hierarchy.subdomain: Professional Ethics and Codes of Conduct

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the ethical trade-offs of anonymous vs. identified reporting to cybersecurity ethics committees (e.g., (ISC)² or ISACA). Consider impacts on investigation thoroughness, whistleblower safety, and organizational trust. Support arguments with real-world examples like insider threat cover-ups.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
